attributes.action: Government Must Ask The Brexit Party For Solutions To Leave The European Union
attributes.additional_details: In 2016, the U.K voting public voted in majority to leave the European Union, and The Brexit Party now hold 29 seats in the European Parliament, which is the vast majority of seats held by any U.K political party within the European Parliament.  As supporters of this petition, we believe that The Brexit Party want to represent the 17.4 million people of the United Kingdom who voted for our nation to leave the European Union.
attributes.background: We demand that the United Kingdom Government invites 'The Brexit Party' to be part of discussing and establishing a solution for the United Kingdom to leave the European Union.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes petitions calling for people to be given jobs or removed from jobs.
